channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Are Never Trumpers Abandoning Biden and Moving Toward...Trump?
Former GOP Rep. Fortenberry charged with lying about illegal campaign contribution
item.description: Republican former Nebraska Rep. Jeff Fortenberry has been charged with lying to federal authorities about an illegal, $30,000 campaign contribution by a Nigerian billionaire.

item.title: Speaker Johnson: Olive Branch Offered to Rep. Greene
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson, R-La., said Thursday he extended an olive branch to Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene, R-Ga., after her motion to remove him was soundly defeated.

item.title: RFK Jr. Doubles Down on Support for Full-Term Abortion
Taxpayer-funded ID program for illegal immigrants expected to begin this summer
item.description: Immigration and Customs Enforcement is looking to roll out a controversial ID card pilot program for illegal immigrants as early as this summer.

item.title: Rep. Fleischmann to Newsmax: Equal Representation Act Counters Radical Left
item.description: The House bill passed Wednesday that would add a citizenship question to the census and require that only citizens count when determining the number of congressional seats a state receives will counter what the radical left has done, Rep. Chuck Fleischmann said.

item.title: Mike Pence accuses Biden of impeachment hypocrisy amid Israel arms threat
item.description: Former Vice President Mike Pence called out President Biden for threatening to withhold arms aid to Israel during a CNN interview, warning the Israelis not to go farther into Rafah.

item.title: Oklahoma Judge Blocks Anti-ESG State Law
item.description: A judge in Oklahoma, a major oil and gas producing state, blocked a state law prohibiting state pension systems from contracting with more than a dozen companies that limit investment in the oil and gas industry.

item.title: OPINION: As a Black Man, I’ll Take Ann Coulter’s Racism Over Kathy Hochul’s
Anti-Israel occupiers could lose federal student loans under new GOP Senate bill
item.description: Sen. Thom Tillis, R-N.C., introduced a bill to strip financial aid from protesters who break the law at universities.

item.title: Texas to Compensate Landowners for Damage From Border Crime
item.description: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton initiated a program to compensate landowners along the Texas-Mexico border for damages to their property that may have been the result of illegal border crossers, smugglers and drug traffickers.

item.title: They're Special but Not You; NY College Holds Special Graduation Ceremonies for Certain Student Groups
House GOP drafting Biden impeachment articles over Israel aid cutoff threat
item.description: House Republicans are coming out with calls for President Biden to be impeached after he threatened to halt offensive weapons aid to Israel if it invaded Rafah.

item.title: McConnell Warns Biden: Refusing Israeli Aid Will Prove 'Grave'
item.description: The "consequences will be grave" if President Joe Biden can't find the "political courage to stand up to radicals on his left flank" and support Israel, Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell warned in a speech on the Senate floor Thursday.
